notification.contentToBeAnonymized: Ozohungira zove zizove zitja anonimisiwa muhongero wa mazuva 7 gore
notification.communityContentToBeAnonymized: Ozohungira zose zomaukumbi gawe zizove zitja anonimisiwa zicike zihongorewe muhongero wa mazuva 7, omazuva ozo ozove otjihepo kutja kuzozikura kana kuzozivandudza. Wona ozohungira zove ziri pasi apa.
notification.groupContentToBeAnonymized: Ozohungira zose zomagungu gawe zizove zitja anonimisiwa zicike zihongorewe muhongero wa mazuva 7, omazuva ozo ozove otjihepo kutja kuzozikura kana kuzozivandudza. Wona ozohungira zove ziri pasi apa.

email.possibleFraudFooter: Tinya okuukumbi gwomaukumbi guri pasi apa, pinda ngokutjindika mongarero zicike zokhethe Fraud management komeho.
email.possibleFraudSubHeader: Ongombeji yomahemuhemu a kufurudisa okukira nomukana wa 75% yokuva kufurudisa
email.possibleFraudInformation: Ohungiro yedu yomahangarero yatjivirira mahemuhemu a kufurudisa. Onga kambadhala okutjivirira okuukumbi gwomaukumbi. Mahemuhemu anga ari na zivamvo zokufurudisa zicike zitjivire okuzozikambadhala zicike okuzozikura.
email.automaticToxicityDetection: Ozohungira zino zatjivirirwa otomatiki ngokutja kufurudisa okukira AI algorithms okukira okutja kufurudisa kwezohungira. Onga kuzikura ozohungira zino kana zikira.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionVision: AI algorithm otomatiki yatjivirira ozohungira zino zomifanekiso. Algorithm yino yotjivirira mifanekiso gore okukira mifanekiso ya vakuru, yohondo, yezokurapa, zicike yomahemuhemu. Onga kuzikura ozohungira zino kana zikira.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionDisclaimer: Ohandjera, AI algorithm o pima okukala okukanguruka, omatati gandje oye u na ti zikira, oha na ti kara ekoto ehi na u na zignore email oyu.
email.newPointedAddedToThisIdea: Ombepo oshasha oye oongedwa omongandjo oyu
email.newPointedAddedToIdea: Ombepo oshasha oye oongedwa omongandjo yoye
email.hasBeenMarkedDown: oye omarkwa okuva na oshali olyaupale
email.hasBeenReported: oye oreportiwa okuva na okuhungwa omitemo
email.postReport: Eumbo lyoye okwa li reportwa okuza violationga terms
email.pointReport: Ompuzu okwa li reportwa okuza violationga terms
email.user_invite_1: Oma u kalikwa okuya kuthililwa mO...
email.user_invite_2: Kiliki omukalo gokuya ka u paste oyo mokati ka browser address bar okuya kuthililwa ukukalikwa

email.reset_password_2: Oka uha kavehepo ozo, ka u ignore imeili ino.
email.reset_password_3: Oshimwamoono shoka sha u tjitandjuka okuza ko u shiga oshilinko shoka sha u tjipe omusha.
